mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO file ( id, task_log_id, event_id, name, object_name, provider, type, size, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, deleted ) VALUES
( #{file.id}, #{file.taskLogId}, #{file.eventId}, #{file.name}, #{file.objectName}, #{file.provider}, #{file.type}, #{file.size}, #{file.createTime}, #{file.updateTime}, #{file.tenantId}, #{file.deleted} )
